reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress cute in design. However, the material quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it good while others report issues. Moreover, the sizing is problematic, with customers noting it's not long enough to be a dress and the hat size being too small. Additionally, the product has quality issues, and one customer mentions it has a terrible smell.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are perfect for me . Bought 4
items.body: Perfect for me! I ordered white beige, black, and white. Love that they come in XS. Can wear with jeans, leggings, over dresses and with skirts. These are perfect for a capsule wardrobe. For $25, the size, the length, fabric all work for me. I like they aren’t extra heavy, just the right weight and thickness. Honestly I bought the white and beige first and the beige hate and scarf didn’t match the sweater but the size and price were so great I ordered the other 2. I’m 5’6” and 120lbs Read more
items.author: Jenn Bird

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quality which this has none.
items.body: This was the worst item! It smell lrg holes, no shape and there was no hat. It was roled in plastic. I will be returning this item , I just want my money back. I dint want it give ant stars but I had to. Read more
items.author: sermarion davis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It smells terrible!
items.body: I took it out if the shrink wrap and was floored by how bad it smelled. The garment has been aired for three days so i can try it on, but it still smells like garlic or something old and dead. Not sure uf i want to keep it. The actual sweater is cute, it really is parachute like so unless you belt it will puff out, no feminine shape, its soft but like i said smell really really really nasty. Read more
items.author: Penny

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but not long enough to be a dress.
items.body: Very nice, but it is not long enough to be considered a dress. I'm going to keep it because it's still so cute. Great quality, but I would not be comfortable bending over in this. I will have to wear tights Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not thick like pictured and loose holes in knit, hat size is literally for a child, smells
items.body: The sweater is not as thick as pictured. There were big gaps in the knitting in certain areas to the extent you could immediately see my tan bra color through the holes. The loose knit was even worse on one side all the way down. I measure as a petite head size and I could not even get the hat past the crown of my head so made for a young still growing child. The scarf was thin, and not well finished at the ends. There was a musty vinegary kind of smell on most of it. It was not as long on me as pictured but it did still have some length to it. I can tell it will stretch out of shape easy and not wash up well. I only wanted it for the sweater, didn't care about the hat and scarf but I will still be returning it. Read more
items.author: LKS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No go sweater dress
items.body: It was falling apart before I even wore it. Poorly fitted. Looks like an oversized sweater not long enough to be a dress. It is practically see through in some areas. Has an awful package smell. I just tried it on and it made my skin itch. Read more
items.author: AvidShopper

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good material, awful odor
items.body: Good material and design; however the hat had an awful odor. Read more
items.author: Oz

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, White, Beige, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
